Name: Pre-Flight
checklistText:
1. All left panel fuses - NO. 1 POSITION
2. Squib switch - OFF
3. Auto retro jett switch - ARM
4. ASCS switch - NORM
5. RSCS switch - AUTO
6. Gyro switch - GYRO NORM
7. Manual fuel handle - PUSH IN
8. Roll fuel handle - PUSH IN
9. Yaw fuel handle - PUSH IN
10. Pitch fuel handle - PUSH IN
11. Retro delay switch - INST
12. Photo lights switch - ON
13. Cabin lights switch - BOTH
14. TLM-LO freq switch - ON
15. Rescue switch - AUTO
16. Launch Contl switch - OFF
17. Jett Tower Ring - IN
18. Sep Capsule Ring - IN
19. Retro Att switch - AUTO
20. Fire Retro switch - GUARD
21. Jett Retro switch - GUARD
22. Snorkel Ring - IN
23. Main Ring - IN
24. Reserve Ring - IN
25. Landing Bag switch - AUTO
26. Control Fuel - CHECK
      a. Auto Fuel - 100%
      b. Manual Fuel - 100%
27. Rate of Descent - 0 FT/SEC
28. Altimeter - CHECK
29. Satellite clock
      a. Time of Day
      b. Time from launch - ZERO
      c. Time to Retrograde
30. Attitude/Rate ind. - CHECK
      a. Rate indicators - CENTER
      b. Attitude indicators - CHECK
31. Time Zero Cover - REMOVE
32. Cabin pressure - CHECK
33. Cabin Air temp - CHECK
34. Suit Env. Indicator - CHECK
35. Oxygen Qunatity - CHECK
      a. Primary - 100%
      b. Secondayr - 100%
36. Suit Fan switch - NORM
37. Cabin Fan switch - NORM
38. DC Volts knob - MAIN
39. ASCS AC Bus - NORM
40. Stby Btry switch - ON
41. Isol Btry switch - STBY
42. Inlet Valve Pwr switch - NORM
43. Audio Bus switch - NORM
44. AC voltmeter: 150 VOLTS
45. VOX Pwe switch - OFF
46. UHF DF switch - NORM
47. UHF select switch - HI PWR
48. Transmit switch - OFF
49. Beacon switch - GRND
50. All Audio Tone switches - ON
51. Warning Lights switch - BRIGHT
52. All switch fuses - NO. 1 POSITION
53. Emer O2 switch - NORM
54. Suit Temp selector - TO MARK
55. Cabin Temp selector - TO MARK
56. Inverter Temp selector - TO MARK
